channel.title: CVE Feed for Soflyy -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Soflyy -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-31939|2024-04-10T19:17:54.335Z -- Soflyy -- Import any XML or CSV File to WordPress
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Soflyy Import any XML or CSV File to WordPress.This issue affects Import any XML or CSV File to WordPress: from n/a through 3.7.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-31390|2024-05-08T08:30:06.526Z -- Soflyy -- Breakdance
item.description: : Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') vulnerability in Soflyy Breakdance allows : Code Injection.This issue affects Breakdance: from n/a through 1.7.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-31380|2024-04-25T08:44:28.879Z -- Soflyy -- Oxygen Builder
item.description: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') vulnerability in Soflyy Oxygen Builder allows Code Injection.This issue affects Oxygen Builder: from n/a through 4.8.2.
